title: Vivid Sydney: Two-Hour Seafood Gourmet Dining Experience for Two with Champagne & Sydney Harbour Views
description:
Encapsulate the spirit of Vivid this year with a quintessentially Sydney dining experience at Harbourfront Seafood Restaurant. Your vantage point is second to none to watch the stunning skyline light up in a flurry of colour and light, with highly-sought-after waterside seating overlooking the iconic Sydney Opera House and The Harbour Bridge.

Harbourfront Seafood Restaurant have curated a two-tiered seafood stand, brimming with hot and cold seafood produce sourced directly from Australian suppliers. Dine out on Crudo kingfish and salmon with lemon, soy, olive oil and caviar, grilled eastern king prawns with XO butter, Sydney rock oysters and more, paired with a glass of G.H. Mumm Champagne to toast to your sophisticated evening out. The beautifully restored Campbellâ€™s Stores at The Rocks weaves Sydney's rich history into its contemporary present, making it the perfect backdrop for the city's most internationally-renowned festival.
offer_address: Campbell's Stores, Bay 1-3, 7-27 Circular Quay West, The Rocks, Sydney, NSW, 2000
